description: We've seen stability issues (Timing issues, lag in the OS, network response problems, etc.) for domUs using clocksource=jiffies as part of the PV-args.  Recommending we remove it from the initial XenServer VM settings.
title: Remove clocksource=jiffies from xenserver configurations
